data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Haeckel, Martin, Farkac, Jan, Sehnal, Rostislav (2016): Calosomaaethiops (Jeannel, 1940) as a new synonym of Calosomaimbricatumhottentotum Chaudoir, 1852, a new status of Calosomaroeschkei Breuning, 1927, and a revision of the Calosomasenegalense group sensu Haeckel, 2012 (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Carabini). ZooKeys 609: 11-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.6822, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.609.6822
